response.overview: Ancient Town Love describes a love story that takes place in a city in the Pearl River Delta and is triggered by the existence or disappearance of the ancestral house. The film is about a young overseas Chinese returning to his hometown after more than 20 years away, involving the love-hate entanglement between him and the three heroines, which is either lingering or helpless. Yi Nengjing plays the female gardener Ye Bei, and will stage a complicated "husband-grabbing battle" with the other two girls.
response.title: Ancient Town Affection
